CHAT.comment: ARNOLD SCHWARZENEGGER, GOVERNOR OF CALIFORNIA, ET AL., Petitioners v. ENTERTAINMENT MERCHANTS ASSOCIATION, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ZACKERY P. MORAZZINI ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL M. SMITH ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ZACKERY P. MORAZZINI ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:04 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
